LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.TEXT: Retrieve a existing store from DB

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA s_xml TYPE string. DATA s_data TYPE ygplds_storage. DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root.
SELECT SINGLE * INTO s_data FROM ygplds_storage WHERE id = id. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_not_found EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_not_found=>store_not_found id = id. ENDIF.
* Authority check IF s_data-confidential IS NOT INITIAL AND s_data-owner <> sy-uname. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_authorization EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_authorization=>confidential_store. ENDIF.
s_xml = unzip_string( s_data-raw_data ).
TRY. CALL TRANSFORMATION id SOURCE XML s_xml RESULT store = result. CATCH cx_xslt_serialization_error INTO o_cx. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_serialize EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_serialize=>xslt_serialization_error previous = o_cx. CATCH cx_transformation_error INTO o_cx. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_serialize EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_serialize=>transformation_error previous = o_cx. ENDTRY.

` DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root. DATA s_xml TYPE string. DATA s_data TYPE ygplds_storage.
SELECT SINGLE * INTO s_data FROM ygplds_storage WHERE id = o_store->id. IF sy-subrc = 0. IF s_data-confidential IS NOT INITIAL AND s_data-owner <> sy-uname. * RAISE EXCEPTION ENDIF. ENDIF. s_data-id = o_store->id. GET TIME STAMP FIELD s_data-timestamp. s_data-owner = sy-uname. s_data-cprog = sy-cprog. * s_data-CONFIDENTIAL = * s_data-HOLD = s_data-mem_size = o_store->memory_size.
TRY. CALL TRANSFORMATION id SOURCE store = o_store RESULT XML s_xml. CATCH cx_xslt_serialization_error INTO o_cx. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_serialize EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_serialize=>xslt_serialization_error previous = o_cx. CATCH cx_transformation_error INTO o_cx. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_ds_cx_serialize EXPORTING textid = ygpl_ds_cx_serialize=>transformation_error previous = o_cx. ENDTRY.
s_data-raw_data = zip_string( s_xml ). s_data-db_size = XSTRLEN( s_data-raw_data ). MODIFY ygplds_storage FROM s_data. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

` TRY. CALL METHOD cl_abap_gzip=>decompress_text EXPORTING gzip_in = data * gzip_in_len = -1 conversion = 'DEFAULT' IMPORTING * text_out_len = text_out = result. CATCH cx_parameter_invalid_range. result = data. CATCH cx_sy_buffer_overflow. result = data. CATCH cx_sy_conversion_codepage. result = data. CATCH cx_sy_compression_error. result = data. ENDTRY.

` TRY. CALL METHOD cl_abap_gzip=>compress_text EXPORTING text_in = data * text_in_len = -1 compress_level = 9 conversion = 'DEFAULT' IMPORTING * gzip_out_len = gzip_out = result. CATCH cx_parameter_invalid_range. result = data. CATCH cx_sy_buffer_overflow. result = data. CATCH cx_sy_conversion_codepage. result = data. ENDTRY.
